Title: Tooth Fairy
Writer: Lowell Ganz (screenplay), Babaloo Mandel (screenplay), Joshua Sternin (screenplay), Jennifer Ventimilia (screenplay), Randi Mayem Singer (screenplay), Jim Piddock (story)
Actors: Dwayne Johnson, Ashley Judd, Stephen Merchant, Ryan Sheckler
Plot: A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.
